name: Fon Music
description: The traditions of the Fon people, originating in central and southeastern Benin as well as the southwestern region of Nigeria.

children.name: Tchink System
children.description: Urban version of Tchinkoumé featuring traditional tchinkoumé rhythms, derived from zinli, and including contemporary instrumentation from the influence of R&B, Pop and Rock.

children.name: Tchinkoumé
children.description: Tradition from the central region of Benin around Savalou, played with water percussion.

children.name: Zinli
children.description: Traditional rhythmic chanting and percussion adapted to multiple West African contexts in the 20th century.
